name: Virus Wars
description:
Join the Doctor in his hunt for viruses, and desinfect the Hospital!

This was my first Game Jam, and I had lots of fun finishing my first game. There were a lot of aspects that I didn't have time to include in 72 hours, but I hope to improve on this game some time in the future. All your feedback is highly appreciated!

This game wouldn't have been possible without the generous creators of art and sounds that are made public for free, and for that you have my deepest gratitude. Credits page is added from the Main Menu.
